name: Film and TV dreams
description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

key_work.title: Fleetwood Mac (this is the one)
key_work.brief_description: In a year many spent locked inside, Nathan Apodaca gliding down a highway on a skateboard, drinking Ocean Spray and lip-synching Fleetwood Mac’s ‘Dreams’ was the tonic we all needed.

end.title: Big Little Lies

video_links.name: Big Little Lies Season 1 Trailer | HBO

end.brief_description: The tale of three mothers of first graders whose apparently perfect lives unravel to the point of murder.

constellations_other.name: Storyboards to Academy Awards
constellations_other.description: Storyboards allow filmmakers, showrunners and game designers to visualise and communicate how their stories will look on-screen.

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

links.description: Stevie Knicks’ dreamy, melancholic vocals made it perfect for a TikTok that took people out of their dreary year (we see you, 2020). The song has appeared in over five screen works, including Big Little Lies, when it features in a limousine sing-along.

start.title: Big Little Lies

start.brief_description: The tale of three mothers of first graders whose apparently perfect lives unravel to the point of murder.

end.title: High Fidelity
end.creator_credit: Adrienne Erickson, Ray Quinlan, ABC Signature, Midnight Radio and Nick Hornby
end.brief_description: Rob Brooks, a female record store owner in the rapidly gentrified neighborhood of Crown Heights, Brooklyn revisit past relationships through music and pop culture, while trying to get over her one true love.

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

links.description: ‘Dreams’ also features in the first episode of Hulu’s short-lived TV remake of High Fidelity, featuring Zoe Kravtiz, who apart from playing record store owner Rob Brooks, stars as Bonnie in Big LIttle Lies.

start.title: Fleetwood Mac (this is the one)
start.brief_description: In a year many spent locked inside, Nathan Apodaca gliding down a highway on a skateboard, drinking Ocean Spray and lip-synching Fleetwood Mac’s ‘Dreams’ was the tonic we all needed.

end.title: Eat Pray Love
end.creator_credit: Ryan Murphy, Michael Dennison, Dede Gardner, Columbia Pictures, Plan B Entertainment, Red Om Films, Bill Groom and Jennifer Salt

video_links.name: Watch the Official EAT PRAY LOVE Trailer in HD

end.brief_description: Liz Gilbert had everything a modern woman is supposed to dream of having – a husband, a house and a successful career – yet like so many others, she found herself lost, confused and searching for what she really wanted in life.

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

links.description: What better movie to feature ‘Dreams’ than Eat Pray Love? A film about a woman following her dreams in order to rediscover herself.

start.title: Eat Pray Love
start.creator_credit: Ryan Murphy, Michael Dennison, Dede Gardner, Columbia Pictures, Plan B Entertainment, Red Om Films, Bill Groom and Jennifer Salt

video_links.name: Watch the Official EAT PRAY LOVE Trailer in HD

start.brief_description: Liz Gilbert had everything a modern woman is supposed to dream of having – a husband, a house and a successful career – yet like so many others, she found herself lost, confused and searching for what she really wanted in life.

end.title: American Horror Story
end.creator_credit: Eryn Krueger Mekash, Evan Peters, Julie Herrin, Lou Eyrich, Todd Nenninger, 20th Century Fox Television, 20th Television, Brad Falchuk Teley-vision and Chloe Arbiture
end.brief_description: An anthology horror drama series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an asylum, a witch coven, a freak show, a hotel, a farmhouse in Roanoke, a cult, the apocalypse and a summer camp.

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

links.description: Ryan Murphy co-wrote the screenplay for Eat Pray Love with Elizabeth Gilbert, who adapted it from her memoir. Ryan Murphy also created American Horror Story with Brad Falchuk. Stevie Nicks appeared as the white witch in season three and eight of the show.

start.title: High Fidelity
start.creator_credit: Adrienne Erickson, Ray Quinlan, ABC Signature, Midnight Radio and Nick Hornby
start.brief_description: Rob Brooks, a female record store owner in the rapidly gentrified neighborhood of Crown Heights, Brooklyn revisit past relationships through music and pop culture, while trying to get over her one true love.

end.title: High Fidelity
end.creator_credit: D.V. DeVincentis, John Cusack, Steve Pink, Laura Bauer, Rudd Simmons and Tim Bevan
end.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2000
end.brief_description: When record store owner Rob Gordon gets dumped by his girlfriend, Laura, because he hasn’t changed since they met, he revisits his top five breakups of all time in an attempt to figure out what went wrong.

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

constellations_other.name: Blizzard, Bowie and the Bonets
constellations_other.description: Overwatch is the beginning of some surprising connections in this Constellation that explores videogame movies, cartoons, and music docos and shows.

links.description: Zoe Kravitz’s mother, Lisa Bonet, starred in the original film adaptation of Nick Hornby’s book High Fidelity as one of Rob Brooks’ (John Cusack) love interests.

constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

links.description: John Cusack starred in the independent comedy Adult World with Evan Peters and Emma Roberts, two actors who have had recurring roles in American Horror Story. Emma Roberts is also the niece of Julia Roberts who starred in Eat Pray Love.

start.title: American Horror Story
start.creator_credit: Eryn Krueger Mekash, Evan Peters, Julie Herrin, Lou Eyrich, Todd Nenninger, 20th Century Fox Television, 20th Television, Brad Falchuk Teley-vision and Chloe Arbiture

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

end.title: The Americans
end.creator_credit: Katie Irish, David Woods, DreamWorks Television and Dan Davis
end.brief_description: Set during the Cold War period in the 1980s, The Americans is the story of Elizabeth and Philip Jennings, two Soviet KGB officers posing as an American married couple in the suburbs of Washington D.C. and their neighbor, Stan Beeman, an FBI Counterintelligence agent.

constellations_other.name: My Hometown: Archives woven into new narrative
constellations_other.description: Offering viewers a snapshot of life on the road for an Australian touring band in the 1960s, 'My Hometown', directed by Sari Braithwaite was developed reimagining archival 8mm footage shot by drummer Leon Isackson.

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

links.description: Stevie Knicks performs ‘Gypsy’ in a season eight episode of AHS, which also features Fleetwood Mac’s ‘Gold Dust Woman’ on the soundtrack. ‘Gold Dust Woman’ also features in The Americans, as does ‘Tusk’ and ‘The Chain’ in memorable scenes.
